mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT_ID , CONTENT_NAME , CONTENT_IMAGE_BYTE , CONTENT_SIZE , CONTENT_CREATE_DATE , CONTENT_UPDATE_DATE , CONTENT_EXTENSION FROM TB_MAINCONTENT ORDER BY CONTENT_CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MAINCONTENT ( CONTENT_ID , CONTENT_NAME , CONTENT_IMAGE_BYTE , CONTENT_SIZE , CONTENT_CREATE_DATE , CONTENT_UPDATE_DATE , CONTENT_EXTENSION) VALUES ( #{contentId} , #{contentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{contentImageByte} , #{contentSize} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{contentExtension})
